PyDSTool
Package PyDSTool :: Module Points :: Class PointInfo
[hide private]
[frames] | no frames]

Class PointInfo

source code

object --+
         |
        PointInfo

Structure for storing individual point labels and information dictionaries within a Pointset object.

This class will not know the size of the Pointset it is associated with, so index upper limits will not be checked in advance.

Do not use a PointInfo object as an iterator, as it is 'infinite' in size! (It uses DefaultDicts as its internal storage, which return {} for undefined labels.)
